item.title: [ENG] Analysis of Chagas disease
item.description: At the end of my degree in Veterinary Sciences at the University of Buenos Aires, I had to submit a final paper on a subject related to my Supervised Professional Practices. I chose the area of “Preventive Medicine and Public Health”. It struck me that it would be a good idea to show a few of R’s qualities as applied to Veterinary Sciences, particularly in the field of Veterinary Epidemiology.
